title: The Black Hole War
description:
The Black Hole War: My Battle with Stephen Hawking to Make the World Safe for Quantum Mechanics By Leonard Susskind
Publisher: Lit..tle, Bro..wn and Com..pany 2008 | 480 Pages | ISBN: 0316016403 , 0316016411 | PDF | 30.2 MB



Cosmology has been sexy since Carl Sagan, Richard Feynman, and Stephen Hawking stormed onto the scene three decades ago, popularizing science for the masses. In The Black Hole War, Susskind plays on our insatiable appetite for the gee-whiz moment, combining lucid explanations for some complex ideas with stories that tend to confirm the eccentricities of the highly intelligent.
